text: Cryoturris aptera is an extinct species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Mangeliidae.Fossilworks: Kurtziella (Cryoturris) aptera ==Description== The length of the shell attains 11.4 mm, its diameter 3.9 mm. ==Distribution== This extinct marine species has been found in Pliocene strata of the Bowden Formation, Jamaica; age range: 3.6 to 2.588 Ma. ==References== * W. P. Woodring. 1928. Miocene Molluscs from Bowden, Jamaica. Part 2: Gastropods and discussion of results . Contributions to the Geology and Palaeontology of the West Indies * A. J. W. Hendy, D. P. Buick, K. V. Bulinski, C. A. Ferguson, and A. I. Miller. 2008. Unpublished census data from Atlantic coastal plain and circum-Caribbean Neogene assemblages and taxonomic opinions. ==External links== * aptera
title: Cryoturris aptera
